trans-unit.source: Be careful! Depending on the options selected, former manually uploaded thumbnails might be erased and replaced by automatically generated thumbnails.
trans-unit.target: Budite oprezni! U zavisnosti od opcija koje izaberete, prethodno manuelno podignute male sličice mogu biti izbrisane i zamenjene sa automatski kreiranim malim sličicama.

trans-unit.source: Also, regenerating thumbnails for all existing images can take several minutes, please be patient.
trans-unit.target: Kreiranje malih sličica za postojeće slike može potrajati nekoliko minuta, molimo buditie strpljivi.

trans-unit.source: You can choose to keep your images stored in the previous system. There's nothing wrong with that.
trans-unit.target: Postoji mogućnost da sačuvate slike uskladištene sa starim sistemom, što ne bi trebalo da izazove problem u funkcionisanju prodavnice.

trans-unit.source: After moving all of your product images, set the "Use the legacy image filesystem" option above to "No" for best performance.
trans-unit.target: Pošto premestite slike svih proizvoda, postavite "Koristite legacy image filesystem" na "No" za najbolji rad.

trans-unit.source: Delete the images linked to this image setting
trans-unit.target: Izbrišite slike povezane sa ovim podešavanjem slika.

trans-unit.source: If you delete this image format, the theme won't be able to use it anymore. This will result in a degraded experience on your front office.
trans-unit.target: Ako izbrišete ovaj format slike, tema više neće moći da ga koristi. To će rezultirati smanjenim korisničkim iskustvom na vašoj prodavnici.

trans-unit.source: Regenerate thumbnails for the selected images? With the "erase" option enabled, the previously selected thumbnails will be deleted.
trans-unit.target: Da li želite ponovo generisati sličice za odabrane slike? Sa opcijom "erase" omogućenom, prethodno odabrane sličice će biti obrisane.

trans-unit.source: Only part of the images have been regenerated. The server timed out before finishing.
trans-unit.target: Само део слика је регенерисана, сервера истекло пре завршетка.

trans-unit.source: Server timed out. The watermark may not have been applied to all images.
trans-unit.target: Isteklo je vreme na serveru. Vodeni žig možda nije primenjen na sve slike.

trans-unit.source: An error occurred while uploading the favicon: cannot copy file "%s" to folder "%s".
trans-unit.target: Došlo je do greške prilikom otpremanja favicon: nije moguće kopirati fajl "%s" u folder "%s".

trans-unit.source: The page Category cannot be moved here.
trans-unit.target: Kategorija ne može da se premesti ovde.

trans-unit.source: Your theme has been correctly reset to its default settings. You may want to regenerate your images. See the Improve > Design > Images Settings screen for the '%regenerate_label%' button.
trans-unit.target: Vaša tema je uspešno resetovana na podrazumevana podešavanja. Možda ćete morati ponovo da generišete slike. Pogledajte dugme '%regenerate_label%' koje se nalazi: Dizajn & CMS > Konfiguracija slika.

trans-unit.source: There is already a theme %theme_name% in your themes folder. Remove it if you want to continue.
trans-unit.target: Već postoji tema %theme_name% u vašem folderu tema. Uklonite je ako želite da nastavitie.

trans-unit.source: Failed to delete theme. Make sure you have permissions and theme is not used.
trans-unit.target: Greška u brisanju teme. Proverite da li imate dozvolu za brisanje i da li je tema trenutno u upotrebi.

trans-unit.source: Cannot adapt theme to RTL languages.
trans-unit.target: Tema se nemože prilagoditi RTL jeziku.

trans-unit.source: After modification, do not forget to regenerate thumbnails
trans-unit.target: Posle izmena, ne zaboravite da pokrenete regenerisanje sličica

trans-unit.source: Make sure the theme you use doesn't rely on this image format before deleting it.
trans-unit.target: Pre nego što izbrišete ovaj format slike, proverite da li tema koju koristite ne zavisi od ovog formata slike.
trans-unit.note: Line: 30 Comment: Regenerate button is only shown for internal API clients (identified via external_issuer field being null)
